name: Para-Beetle
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and spawns facing Mario

name: ...always faces left.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always flies to the left.

name: ...always faces right.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always faces to the right.

name: ...face away from player.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always faces away from the player.

name: Para-Beetle, slow
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes quite slowly, and spawns facing Mario.

name: ...always faces left.

name: ...always faces right.
